components.name: Web Tier
components.description: Handles HTTP(S) requests, includes ELB, EC2 web servers, and CloudFront for edge caching.

components.name: App Tier
components.description: Processes business logic, runs EC2 app servers, and uses Elastic Cache for in‑memory caching.

components.name: Database Tier
components.description: Managed relational database with primary and standby instances for high availability.

components.name: Storage Tier
components.description: S3 bucket for static assets such as images and files.

components.name: Notification Tier
components.description: SNS for push notifications and SES for email delivery.
